title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying it
description: Description: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying it. Steps to reproduce: 1. New a report parameter and set the Display type to List Box. 2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc' and set 'aa' as the default value, then click OK. 3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog and modify 'aa' to 'aaa', then click OK directly. 4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog. OB: The default value previously set for the list box is lost after modifying it. EB: The default value set for the list box should be retained even after modifying it. SR: 1. Create a new report parameter and set the Display type to List Box. 2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc' and set 'aa' as the default value, then click OK. 3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog and modify 'aa' to 'aaa', then click OK. 4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog to verify that the default value is still set as 'aaa'.
